name: System Hardware Info
description: Get detailed system hardware information including CPU, RAM, and disk details
author: Devin

cpu_info.description: CPU specifications including core count, frequency, and architecture

physical_cores.description: Number of physical CPU cores (hardware threads)

logical_cores.description: Total CPU threads including virtual cores (with hyperthreading)

frequency_mhz.description: Current CPU frequency in MHz (may vary with power state)

memory_info.description: System memory (RAM) usage statistics in bytes

total_bytes.description: Total physical RAM installed in bytes

available_bytes.description: Currently available RAM in bytes (free + cached)

used_bytes.description: Currently used RAM in bytes (total - available)

disk_info.description: Primary disk storage capacity and usage in bytes
